title: Writing your first code
description: Learn what coding is and how to write your first lines of code.

title: Variables and Repeats
description: Learn how to create, update and use variables, and learn repeats.

title: Conditionals
description: Learn about if and else keywords, and functions that return things.

title: Functions
description: This week we learn how to make our own functions!

title: Lists
description: This week we learn our first compound data structure - lists.

title: Recap Week
description: We recap everything we've learned so far and introduce your first major project!

title: Dictionaries
description: We look at dictionaries, break, continue and loop counters.

title: Objects
description: We explore the first step into Object-Oriented Programming: objects

title: Methods
description: We explore the second small step into Object-Oriented Programming: methods

title: Classes
description: We finally start to build our own classes!

title: CSS
description: We build some CSS and HTML!

title: JavaScript
description: We explore the crazy (but fun) world of Javascript!

title: Flexbox & Higher Order Functions
description: We learn about Flexbox in CSS and higher order functions in JavaScript.

title: CSS Grid & JavaScript odds and ends
description: We learn about Grid in CSS and some more advanced JS and functional concepts.

title: CSS Absolute Positioning & JS Game mechanics
description: We learn about absolute positioning in CSS and some JS game mecahnics.

title: JavaScript Interactions
description: Learn how to manage mouse and keyboard events in JavaScript.

title: Forms and APIs
description: Learn how to build forms and call APIs in JavaScript.
